welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wilbraham! This charming town is known for its beautiful parks, historical landmarks, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that Wilbraham has to offer during your stay. Enjoy your visit!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westover ARB/Metropolitan Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Westover ARB/Metropolitan Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Barnes Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Barnes Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brainard Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brainard Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Worcester Regional Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
